title: I once read that an on board bomb once caused an airline crash in Brunswick County back in the 50\'s or 60\'s.  Can you shed some light on this?
text:
Here's a link to another Website that provides the best answer to
your question:
http://www2.scnow.com/news/2010/jan/07/case_still_open_50_years_after_mysterious_brunswic-ar-368495/



And here's one more article on the crash:

http://www.brunswickbeacon.com/content/mystery-still-surrounds-bolivia-plane-crash-more-50-years-later
